rect.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); visibility: hidden;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 721px; paint-order: fill; stroke: rgb(186, 218, 85); white-space: pre; pointer-events: none; visibility: hidden;

path.style: fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30; stroke-dashoffset: -15px;
fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30;
